thread.title: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy's Consortium Wins Environment Upgrade Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy's Consortium Wins Environment Upgrade Project

organizations.name: tunghsu azure renewable energy co ltd
brief-tunghsu azure renewable energy's consortium wins environment upgrade project

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Co Ltd :
* SAYS ITS CONSORTIUM WINS BID FOR ENVIRONMENT UPGRADE PPP PROJECT WITH TOTAL INVESTMENT AT 1.85 BILLION YUAN ($294.40 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2GzbuFg Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2839 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
